song.englishname: Until I Am In Love With YOu

english.segment1: Cause me to thirst for You, Lord. Cause me to hunger for your word. Cause me to require You as my vital need. Until I am in love with You. Until I am in love with You. Help me to push through all the clamor. Until I find the sound of Your voice. Strengthen me to war against my enemies. Until I am in love with You. Until I am in love with You. [Chorus]. I need You, Lord..I want You, Lord Consume my heart.. Until I am in love with You. Until I am in love with You. Jesus, Ive tasted of Your mercy. Im taken by the power of Your love. Even now I offer up my heart, my life. Until I am in love with You. Until I am in love with You
